items.longDescription:
- Combines the comfort of a wireless bra with the lifting effect of a wired bra.
- The gorgeous design lifts your mood, flatters your figure, and provides ample support.
- Features delicate flower motif lace and a flattering plunge neckline.
- Newly developed three-dimensional resin parts are built into the cups to provide a shaping effect without sacrificing the comfort of a wireless bra.
- The cross component stops the cups from spreading and maintains the contoured form.
- The cross component provides support and upward lift.
- No wires or resin parts at the bottom of the cup.
items.name: WOMEN Wireless Bra (Shape Lift)
items.shortDescription: A comfortable fit with a lifting effect. Creates a natural, flattering outline.

items.longDescription:
- Made with ultra-stretch material.
- Features a tapered silhouette from the knees to the ankles to elongate legs.
- The thread count, manufacturing technique, and the density of lengthwise yarns create a more authentic look.
- Larger back pockets are placed higher for a flattering look.
- Stretchy fabric for wearable comfort. Mid-rise waist stays in place all day, even while sitting.
- Manufactured using an environmentally-conscious, waterless-washing method developed at the Jeans Innovation Center, reducing water use by more than 90%.
- Hems and trims are added to match the color.
- Featuring classic black that won't fade with wear and washing.

items.longDescription:
UNIQLOs Popular collaboration with legendary designer Jil Sander continues to define the global modern uniform, giving it meaning and purpose for today.
- 2-ply: Two cashmere yarns are twisted together.
- The combination of premium cashmere and extrafine nylon yarn creates a substantial knit with a long-lasting texture.
- Sophisticated fully-fashioned details.
items.name: WOMEN Middle Gauge Cashmere Blend Sweater
items.shortDescription: A luxurious 2-ply cashmere turtleneck jumper. Purchasing limitation: 1 piece per color per person.

items.composition: Shell: 100% Polyester/ Filling: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ Lining: 100% Polyamide/ Rib: 98% Polyester, 2% Elastane
items.longDescription:
UNIQLOs Popular collaboration with legendary designer Jil Sander continues to define the global modern uniform, giving it meaning and purpose for today.
- Durable water-repellent coating.
- Semi-shiny satin.
- Fitted shoulders and sleeves assure a sleek look.
- The longer sleeves are easy to roll up for extra volume.
- Adjust the hem to create a cocoon silhouette.
- Asymmetric cut.
items.name: WOMEN Down Volume Jacket
items.shortDescription: A sophisticated down jacket with a satin texture. Purchasing limitation: 1 piece per color per person.

items.longDescription:
UNIQLOs Popular collaboration with legendary designer Jil Sander continues to define the global modern uniform, giving it meaning and purpose for today.
- 2-ply: Two cashmere yarns are twisted together.
- Bold placket, large buttons and puffy-sleeved cuffs.
- The combination of premium cashmere and extrafine nylon yarn creates a substantial knit with a long-lasting texture.
- Sophisticated fully-fashioned details.
items.name: WOMEN Middle Gauge Cashmere Blend V Neck Cardigan
items.shortDescription: An elegant 2-ply cashmere cardigan. Purchasing limitation: 1 piece per color per person.

items.composition: Shell: 100% Polyester/ Filling: Body: 90% Down, 10% Feathers/ Hood Edge: 100% Polyester/ Hood: Hem: 100% Polyester/ Lining: 100% Polyamide/ Rib: 98% Polyester, 2% Elastane
items.longDescription:
UNIQLOs Popular collaboration with legendary designer Jil Sander continues to define the global modern uniform, giving it meaning and purpose for today.
